actions.command: age_of_exile stat give @s exact critical_damage GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe1 7 7
age_of_exile stat give @s exact critical_damage FLAT origin_aoe2 10 10
age_of_exile stat give @s exact critical_hit FLAT origin_aoe3 10 10
age_of_exile stat give @s exact spell_damage GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe4 -7 -7
age_of_exile stat give @s exact armor GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe5 -10 -10
age_of_exile stat give @s exact dmg_when_target_is_low_hp FLAT origin_aoe6 33 33

name: 능력치
description:
§6치명 확률,피해량§r이 증가하며, 주문 피해량과 방어력이 감소합니다.
§f§l특수 능력치 : 체력이 낮은 적에게 피해 +33%
